de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation
Interface IVisualAgent

All Superinterfaces:
IMovingAgent
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMovingAgent, Bee, FoodSource, Hive, HiveEntrance, Obstacle
public interface IVisualAgent
extends IMovingAgent

This interface provides visual information about an agent. This interface extends the IMovingAgent interface because a visual agent needs a location and size (provided by IMovingAgent) to be visualized.

Author:
hoehne

Method Summary
 IAgentVisualization getVisualizationObject()
          Return the object that will be used for visualizing the this agent.

Method Detail

getVisualizationObject

IAgentVisualization getVisualizationObject()
Return the object that will be used for visualizing the this agent. The type of the object is not known due to different simulation environments so an interface IAgentVisualization is returned.

Returns:
The visualization object.

setVisualizationObject

void setVisualizationObject(IAgentVisualization visual)
Set the object that will be used for visualizing the this agent. The type of the object is not known due to different simulation environments so an interface IAgentVisualization is used.

Parameters:
visual -
